definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.chinese: 古典音乐的听众年纪可能大一些。

sentences.english: He loves music, and above all classical music.
sentences.chinese: 他爱音乐，尤其是古典音乐。
但是，古典音乐也有旋律啊。

sentences.english: Bob and I both loved classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我和鲍勃两个人都喜欢古典音乐。

sentences.english: We had a highbrow discussion on classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我们就古典音乐来了一次高水准的讨论。

sentences.english: He soon tired of listening to classical music.
sentences.chinese: 古典音乐他不久就听厌了。

sentences.english: The so-called classical music, when it is weak and strong melodies, "the expression too."
sentences.chinese: 所谓古典音乐，它时弱时强的旋律“太有表情了”。

sentences.english: A few things strike me as I spin discs from Classical to trip hop.
sentences.chinese: 很少东西可以令我从古典音乐听到流行音乐。

sentences.english: What can you do to keep classical music alive? —Barry Werger Claremont, Calif.
sentences.chinese: 你是如何让古典音乐充满生机的？

sentences.english: No one can match her in her knowledge of classical music.
sentences.chinese: 在古典音乐的知识方面没人比得过他。

sentences.english: Even her taste in classical music speaks to her sense of discipline and composure.
sentences.chinese: 即便她的古典音乐品味，也符合其严谨沉着的气质。

sentences.english: And it really helps you when you're studying.
sentences.chinese: 当你在学习的时候，古典音乐能帮你不少忙。

sentences.english: Enter the world of classical music, feel the art life, adds live color.
sentences.chinese: 进入古典音乐的世界，感受艺术人生，增添生活色彩。

sentences.english: f. Piano is my favorite type of classical music.
sentences.chinese: 钢琴曲是我最喜欢的古典音乐。

sentences.english: Let's talk about what the difference between pop and classical music is.
sentences.chinese: 接下来我们讨论一下流行乐和古典音乐的差别。

sentences.english: Marsalis has a formidable reputation in both jazz and classical music.
sentences.chinese: 马萨利斯在爵士乐和古典音乐领域都有极高的声望。

definition: to perform on a musical instrument
